content: *add a romantic touch to any room with this flowered afghan use it as a decoration or wrap up in it doing the colder months the beautiful magnolia leaf motif will make a beautiful addition to any home lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80266ad skill level intermediate level 3 790-315 homespun yarn tudor 7 balls crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm split ring stitch markers special stitch dtr2tog
